summary: This document is a declaration by Denise Johannes, the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor, in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena dated July 23, 2019. It certifies the authenticity of records requested by the subpoena, affirming they were created in the regular course of business.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes declares her position as the custodian of records and certifies the authenticity of the records in response to a Grand Jury Subpoena.

persons.name: Alison Moe
persons.context: Alison Moe is mentioned as the signatory of the Grand Jury Subpoena requesting records from the business.

events.title: Grand Jury Subpoena Issued
events.description: A Grand Jury Subpoena was issued requesting specified records from the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Declaration Executed
events.description: Denise Johannes executed a declaration certifying the records in response to the subpoena.

locations: 5049 Ironixens Gade, St. Thomas, VT NN8N2
keyFacts: Denise Johannes is the custodian of records for the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.
The Grand Jury Subpoena was dated July 23, 2019.
Alison Moe signed the Grand Jury Subpoena.
The declaration certifies that the records were made in the regular course of business.
The declaration was executed on July 27, 2019.
